alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Northern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 15 at 6:45PM EST until December 18 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM FRIDAY TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 18 inches in the most persistent lake snows. * WHERE...Northern Erie and Genesee counties. The heaviest lake effect snow is expected to be across southern and eastern suburbs of Buffalo and southwest Genesee County. * WHEN...From 7 PM Friday to 1 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times with poor visibility and snow covered roads. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4281 7818 4296 7816 4302 7827 4297 7898 4286 7889 4276 7900 4245 7952 4245 7919 4251 7889 4270 7831 TIME Y22M12D17T0000Z-Y22M12D17T1800Z COORD...4299 7815 4308 7817 4311 7831 4303 7865 4297 7893 4281 7890 4255 7936 4252 7933 4271 7876 4279 7842 TIME Y22M12D17T1800Z-Y22M12D18T0600Z COORD...4268 7817 4290 7814 4298 7830 4294 7884 4279 7890 4232 7975 4217 7977 4230 7931 4240 7873 4253 7841 TIME Y22M12D18T0600Z-Y22M12D18T1800Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
